description: At your desk or on the road, the streamlined Mini Dock instantly turns into a sturdy little stand that’s perfect for making video calls and charging at the same time. It holds your iPhone or iPod Touch firmly in place, keeping you in-frame and free to move. And, you can adjust the screen angle to get the best view in any situation. Also great for watching videos, listening to music and browsing the web.  Take it along in your pocket or purse. The lightweight, compact design works with most iPhone and iPod Touch cases and folds neatly for easy transport. Use the integrated ChargeSync cable when you need to power up or keep it tucked away when you don’t.
title: Belkin Mini Dock for iPhone 4/4S and iPod touch
